raw: * The resetter is responsible for managing a set of fields and resetting these
* fields on a {@link #reset} call. It can handle all form field implementing IField.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The resetter is responsible for managing a set of fields and resetting these fields on a {@link #reset} call. It can handle all form field implementing IField.

raw: * Adding a field to the resetter will get its current value and store
* it for resetting.
* @param field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field which should be added.
* @throws {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adding a field to the resetter will get its current value and store it for resetting.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field which should be added.
@param.description: The field which should be added.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
@throws.description: When given argument is not a field.

raw: * Removes a field from the resetter.
* @param field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field which should be removed.
* @throws {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
* @return {Boolean} true, if the field has been removed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field which should be removed.
@param.description: The field which should be removed.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
@throws.description: When given argument is not a field.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true, if the field has been removed.
@return.description: true, if the field has been removed.

raw: * Resets all added fields to their initial value. The initial value
* is the value in the widget during the {@link #add}.
* @return {null|Error} Returns an error when some fields could not be reset.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets all added fields to their initial value. The initial value is the value in the widget during the {@link #add}.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {null|Error} Returns an error when some fields could not be reset.
@return.description: Returns an error when some fields could not be reset.

raw: * Resets a single given field. The field has to be added to the resetter
* instance before. Otherwise, an error is thrown.
* @param field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field, which should be reset.
* @throws {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
* @return {null|Error} Returns an error when the field value could not be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets a single given field. The field has to be added to the resetter instance before. Otherwise, an error is thrown.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field, which should be reset.
@param.description: The field, which should be reset.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
@throws.description: When given argument is not a field.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {null|Error} Returns an error when the field value could not be set.
@return.description: Returns an error when the field value could not be set.

raw: * Takes the current values of all added fields and uses these values as
* init values for resetting.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes the current values of all added fields and uses these values as init values for resetting.

raw: * Takes the current value of the given field and stores this value as init
* value for resetting.
* @param field {qx.ui.form.IField} The field to redefine.
* @throws {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes the current value of the given field and stores this value as init value for resetting.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
@throws.description: When given argument is not a field.

raw: * Assert when given argument is not a field.
* @param field {qx.ui.form.IField|var} Any argument that should be a field.
* @throws {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
* @private

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Assert when given argument is not a field.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: field {qx.ui.form.IField|var} Any argument that should be a field.
@param.description: Any argument that should be a field.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {TypeError} When given argument is not a field.
@throws.description: When given argument is not a field.
